titles: Forty sermons whereof twenty one are now first publish'd, the greatest part preach'd before the King and on solemn occasions / by Richard Allestree ... ; to these is prefixt an account of the author's life.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
Fell, John, 1625-1686.
place: Printed at the Theater in Oxford and in London :
publisher: For R. Scott, G. Wells, T. Sawbridge, R. Bentley,
notes: "A sermon preach'd in St Peter's Westminster" and "A sermon preached at Hampton-Court" each has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed by John Playford, 1683.
Volume 2 is without title page or preliminary matter.
"The preface" was written by John Fell.
Reproduction of original in the University of Chicago Library.
